events.message: I am reporting an auto accident that occurred yesterday morning involving my vehicle and another car at an intersection.
The claim has been categorised under Auto Accident as it involves a vehicle collision with identifiable damages.
An agent has been assigned to your auto accident claim and will be your point of contact throughout the process.
Your insurance claim for the car collision has been acknowledged and is now officially under review by our team.
Please submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and your driverâ€™s license as part of the claims process.
All requested documents including police report and damage photos have been submitted for your auto accident claim.
An investigation into the auto accident has commenced to verify the facts and assess the extent of vehicle damage.
The investigation regarding your car accident has been completed including a review of all submitted evidence.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the damage assessment and coverage terms of your auto insurance policy.
We have received your feedback regarding the proposed settlement and noted your request for clarification on repair costs.
Your auto accident claim has officially been approved and the settlement terms are now finalized.
We have issued the payment to your bank account according to the approved settlement for your vehicle repair.
Your auto accident claim is now closed as all payments have been processed and repairs are underway.
This claim file has been archived for your records. Please contact us if you require any further assistance.
